# CellAllocCallback delegate

```csharp
public delegate bool CellAllocCallback(IntPtr renderer, IntPtr cell_area, IntPtr cell_background, 
    IntPtr data);
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| renderer | Transfer ownership: none |
| cell_area | Transfer ownership: none |
| cell_background | Transfer ownership: none |
| data | Transfer ownership: none; Nullable: true |

## Return Value

Transfer ownership: none
